cognitive_context.problem_understanding: Project manages household cleaning checklists as interactive HTML files with progress tracking. Two-person team splits deep cleaning duties. Project needs standardized naming conventions and handoff documentation for AI continuity.

attempted_solutions.approach: Used Windows 'ren' command for file rename
Used Glob to discover all project files
attempted_solutions.outcome: Partial success - some files not initially visible
attempted_solutions.resolution: Used 'ls -la' to get complete file listing

key_insights: Project has Google Sheets integration (per git history)
Two distinct color schemes identify team member checklists
LocalStorage used for checkbox persistence across sessions
DEV file exists alongside production file - likely for testing changes
assumptions: User wants date immediately after Deep_Clean prefix, not at filename end
Handoff infrastructure should follow enterprise patterns despite small project
All HTML checklists follow same technical pattern (localStorage, progress bar)
uncertainties: Whether index.html is actively used as landing page
Difference between DEV and production Full House checklist
Whether naming convention guide should be updated to match new format

modified_files.Deep_Clean_2025-10-06_Master_Bedroom_and: Renamed from original - date moved after Deep_Clean
modified_files.Deep_Clean_2025-10-06_Office_and_Living_: Renamed from original - date moved after Deep_Clean

breaking_changes: File renames may break external links to original checklist URLs
technical_debt_added: Naming convention guide not updated to reflect new date placement

decision_log.decision: Place date after Deep_Clean prefix in filenames
decision_log.rationale: User explicitly requested date after 'deep clean' in filename
alternatives: Keep date at end per naming guide

decision_log.decision: Create full handoff infrastructure with multiple directories
decision_log.rationale: User specified four pillars approach requiring comprehensive structure

decision_log.decision: Use 'opus-4.5' as model identifier in filenames
decision_log.rationale: Shorter than full model ID, matches user's example format

investigation_needed: What is the difference between DEV and production Full House checklist?
Is the naming convention guide still authoritative?
